mapper.sql: id, `uid`, `number`, protocol_url, student_url, desk1_url, desk2_url, way, account_id, `state`, cause, submit_date, update_date
mapper.select:
select audit.id, u.user_name, u.house_id, u.pact_time, audit.state, audit.submit_date, audit.way from audit left join user u on audit.uid = u.id
and ${search}
mapper.insert:
insert into audit
`uid`,
`number`,
protocol_url,
student_url,
desk1_url,
desk2_url,
way,
account_id,
`state`,
cause,
submit_date,

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
